decision_conditions: The submitted details of materials in pursuant to condition 3 of planning application Ref: 223038FUL dated 26/10/2022, are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7.4 and 7B; London Plan (2021) policy D3; and National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of materials in pursuant to condition 3 of planning application Ref: 223038FUL dated  26/10/2022 for 'Demolition of existing building and construction of three storey building to provide nine self-contained residential units (Use Class C3), private and communal amenity space, landscaping, parking spaces and associated access arrangements.'
